group_1.textRight: So, now there are four Hayates left...

group_1.textLeft: They're all pretty darn good copies, too.
They must've had lots of time to get her@mold just right...

group_1.textRight: Well, why don't we quiz them?
Hayate...
How did she become a Magical Girl?

group_1.textLeft: Hm, would've been about a decade ago.
The Tome of the Night Sky chose me...
...to become its mistress.

group_1.textRight: Tome of the Night Sky...
Is that the book you open when you cast@your magic?

group_1.textLeft: Uh huh.
It's a book filled with Ancient Belkan magic@formulas.

group_1.textRight: Nanoha and I use the Midchildan system of@magic.
Modern users of this magic like us are@called mages...

group_1.textLeft: But the Ancient Belkan magic I use is from@a bygone era, long extinct from this world.
Those who use it are called Mage Knights.
We even wear knight armor.

group_1.textRight: D-did you say kn-knights?! Real knights?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes...what about them?

group_1.textRight: Oh, sorry for butting in!
It's just...I became a Magical Girl because@I admired a virtuous knight, you see...
So I wanted to join the conversation!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I see... So that must be why you're@dressed like a knight, too.
I think you'd get along well with Signum.

group_1.textRight: Signum?

group_1.textLeft: Signum, our Knight of the Sword... General@of the Guardians of the Night Sky.
She's a master swordswoman.

group_1.textRight: Oh... I'd love to meet her!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry, but...
The other members of the Yagami family@didn't come with me today.

group_1.textRight: I see... That's too bad.
Those Guardians of the Night Sky... Who@are they?

group_1.textLeft: Four guardians tasked with protecting the@master of the Tome of the Night Sky.
The Guardians are very strong, and they@serve me well.
Though of course I do my best to cook@their meals and take care of them.
It's almost kind of my job.
Though I feel like a mistress's job should@be something more than that...

group_1.textRight: That's a really Hayate way of answering.
If this one's a fake...
They must've copied all her memories and@knowledge pretty perfectly.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe you should try askin' somethin' else?
Sasara, why don't you give it a whirl?

group_1.textRight: Hmm, all right. What other kinds of Guardians@are there?

group_1.textLeft: There's Shamal, the Knight of the Lake.@She's good at healing magic...
And the Knight of the Iron Hammer, Vita.
And Zafira, our familiar. He usually takes@the form of a wolf.
Huh?

group_1.textRight: Say that one more time?
Zafira, our familiar, usually takes the form@of a wolf...

group_1.textLeft: Wait a second!
Zafira wouldn't stand being called a@familiar!
He prefers to be called a Guardian Beast!

group_1.textRight: Wow, these are rigorous checks...
*Giggle* Sorry, I'm only a copy! Still...@Do you really think you can defeat me?
